channel.title: TASAHM-Scape - - By Tatemo, SilentCJ, and Assassins Creed Fan
channel.description:
You can guess what the name stands for XD [center] This is my latest project I am making it with Silent Cj and Assassins Creed Fan.
Purpose: To make a server that with the input of a command can be transformed from an All star like base to an Delta like base (Except without the glitches and the lag and that shit)
Base: Devoloution 2.4[/center]
Features: All the perfect shit from Devoloution 2.4 Full mining (Soon to have different rates and such for Pkmode and non pkmode)(This has its own handler and is well coded) Full Woodcutting with different Rates and rewards depending on whether the server is set to Pkmode or non pkmode. Full theiving(Made by Killamess) with different rates for the different modes. I have completely reimplanted the Allstar-scape skilling area(Only accessible when in Pkmode) and it is fully working except for the mining rocks which I hope to have finished by tomorrow. (And the Farming cause I wanna handle this and write it properly) I have made home exactly like Reapage scape (minus some dumb npcs + Talking on most npcs) Added all the reapage shops (Still have to clean the unused ones) Added full Smithing Not yet done the smelting. Got the method for crafting down just havent got round to the item on item shizz. I might release the source just to get people to stop leeching delta at a later date. I prefer the all star/reapage type bases and will be mainly coding for the pkmode version of the server.
In both Woodcutting and Mining the trees/rocks go to stumps/empty rocks. They all give the correct reward(in non pkmode)
I have also added Reapage Pkbox and my own pkbox. Each with a section in front of the entry where you cannot move for a short time while you are warned that it is dangerous. (They are both safe pk but still XD)
Here are the pictures. (Yes, I am using Cjs HD Client, No you cannot have it)
ALLSTAR SKILLING AREA [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/New%20Server/Allstarpkingarea.jpg[/img] USES HARDLY ANY RESOURCES [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/New%20Server/HARDLYANYCPU.jpg[/img] MY PKBOX PLUS EXAMPLE OF WARNING [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/New%20Server/PKBOXMADEBYMEWITHWALKPAUSING.jpg[/img] REAPAGE HOME [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/New%20Server/REAPAGESCAPEHOME.jpg[/img] REAPAGE PKBOX [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/New%20Server/ReapagescapePkbox.jpg[/img]
For those who dont know features of Devoloution: Full Cooking Full Fishing Full Theiving Full Teleporting Perfect combat The best base out there if there is anything I have forgotten on this list please tell me Killamess.
UPDATES: Finished skilling area - farming which I am going to do later. Completed the pkingMode command just need someone to tell me how to make a loop to affect all players. Mining: Made the different exps for pkingmode or non pkingmode. Client updated with the new right click menus (Thx Tonic)

item.title: TASAHM-Scape - - By Tatemo, SilentCJ, and Assassins Creed Fan
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:65, topic:289071”]The problem with Delta is its a really nice base for noobs. But the problem is it has so many bugs and stuff that noobs dont even think about or realise are there that they learn to code badly on it. (E.g thinking the same code repeated 10 times is the right way to do it rather than using a void.

That is what I originally thought when I began coding which is why a lot of Noobscape is horrific.[/quote]

Yes, but also you have people like me and Obbyme, who have rearranged deltas files, cleaned it out, got his v16 client, edited cache, rearranged teleports, clear quest tabs, eh did awhole bunch of stuff.

Read full topic

I MISS YOU CJ. Got so much to do with School and shizzle.

Here are some updates I done:

Made minimap and screen go black while objects load everytime you load a new area. (So you cant noclip and shizzle(also to look more professional))

Just finished Gsmini now I just need to add the using the key on the portal and chaos elementals dropping keys + monster health other than that finished YAY.

ax mx yxx:

It’s a very pretty cilent O:

I haven’t even properly edited the sprites and gameframe yet though, i just replaced that gameframe with one that i quickly cut up, and then i used some of my awesome photoshop skills (not so awesome) and just edited around the mapback a little, and removed the world map etc.
But yeah, some graphical work will soon be done.

item.title: TASAHM-Scape - - By Tatemo, SilentCJ, and Assassins Creed Fan
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:70, topic:289071”][quote author=rune-pure link=topic=382163.msg2880018#msg2880018 date=1248287267]

If you think the client is hd, YOU ARE RETARDED IF YOU THINK IT IS.

Also The elve, trolling?

HD stands for High Detail, it has High Detailed character models, armour and weapon models, npc models, and some high detail object models.
It’s not far off from what you could call HD, and i haven’t added my textures yet.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 20-07-2009, 00:49:58[/size][hr]Check this.

Silent, dispite your expert modeling, you are a dumbass.

YOU CANNOT MAKE A 317 HD JUST BECAUSE OF THE TEXTURES, MODELS OR PATTERNS!

If you want HD join a fucking 508!
[/quote]

Alright then, you tell me what’s different in a 508 than from a 317 graphics wise.
It’s textures, animations, models and gfx’s basically.

No, i cannot add 508 animations, but some gfx’s are possible, models are easily possible, and textures can quite easily be done.
No, it’s not a HD client, but it has a few High Detail characteristics about it.[/quote]

Damn Cj your models are l33t

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“rune-pure, post:68, topic:289071”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=382163.msg2876001#msg2876001 date=1248043874]

If you think the client is hd, YOU ARE RETARDED IF YOU THINK IT IS.

Also The elve, trolling?

HD stands for High Detail, it has High Detailed character models, armour and weapon models, npc models, and some high detail object models.
It’s not far off from what you could call HD, and i haven’t added my textures yet.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 20-07-2009, 00:49:58[/size][hr]Check this.


[/quote]

Silent, dispite your expert modeling, you are a dumbass.

YOU CANNOT MAKE A 317 HD JUST BECAUSE OF THE TEXTURES, MODELS OR PATTERNS!

If you want HD join a fucking 508![/quote]

Alright then, you tell me what’s different in a 508 than from a 317 graphics wise.
It’s textures, animations, models and gfx’s basically.

No, i cannot add 508 animations, but some gfx’s are possible, models are easily possible, and textures can quite easily be done.
No, it’s not a HD client, but it has a few High Detail characteristics about it.

Oh, and, i’m not a dumbass. You spelt despite wrong.

item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

The problem with Delta is its a really nice base for noobs. But the problem is it has so many bugs and stuff that noobs dont even think about or realise are there that they learn to code badly on it. (E.g thinking the same code repeated 10 times is the right way to do it rather than using a void.

That is what I originally thought when I began coding which is why a lot of Noobscape is horrific.

item.title: TASAHM-Scape - - By Tatemo, SilentCJ, and Assassins Creed Fan
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Of course not, i practically started from nothing, and built it up, Galkon’s very first client base.
I’ve added a total of roughly 1200 models to it, not preloaded, added a new gameframe, custom mod crowns cache edited, some new methods, and a hell of a lot of new sprites.
I’ll be adding textured armour soon, if i can figure it out, then it really will be HD, bandos tassets textured. drools

Read full topic
